resources.string: Your LycanRom installation is almost done! We are a project mainly based on CyanogenMod many cherry-picks from another great projects as SlimRoms, OmniRom, Paranoid Android, AICP, Dirty Unicorns, Euphoria-OS, Temasek and many others. Our goal is to keep all CM features working with useful codes from pointed projects. If in any case you find a bug or a weird behavior, please report in our Google Plus community. Proceed with the final steps of your installation and thank you for installing LycanRom on your tablet!! %s.

Your LycanRom installation is almost done! We are a project mainly based on CyanogenMod many cherry-picks from another great projects as SlimRoms, OmniRom, Paranoid Android, AICP, Dirty Unicorns, Euphoria-OS, Temasek and many others. Our goal is to keep all CM features working with useful codes from pointed projects. If in any case you find a bug or a weird behavior, please report in our Google Plus community. Proceed with the final steps of your installation and thank you for installing LycanRom on your phone!! %s.
